title: Cod in parsley sauce with cockles and mashed potato
description: If you can't find any live cockles, you can buy a jar of cooked and shelled cockles instead.
ingredients: 350g/12oz centre-cut cod fillet, pin boned and skinned
2 large potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks
100g/3½oz cockles, thoroughly washed to remove any sand or silt
1 large bunch curly parsley, leaves picked, stalks reserved, both chopped
